item.description:
Bringing People Together-
German Language Groups: Fairfield and Hartford County Groups meet at last!!!

IF YOU NEED DIRECTIONS TO THE RESTAURANT, PLEASE CHECK THE MAP ON THEIR WEBSITE www.watchfactoryrestaurant.com
Elm Street is just off Academy, known as route 70. See you there!


Hallo Leute -

Dianne und Korinna (Fairfield/Westchester county German Language group) moechten endlich einmal beide Gruppen zusammenfuehren.

Wir haben einen Treffpunkt in der Mitte ausgemacht, wo wir uns zum Mittagessen treffen koennen. http://www.watchfacto....

Alle diejenigen, die dann die Koestlichkeiten wieder abtrainieren moechten, laden wir anschliessend zu einem gemuetliche Spaziergang ganz in der Nahe.
Hoffentlich koennt ihr beides mitmachen. Ihr werdet aber zwei separate Einladungen bekommen, falls ihr nur das eine oder andere schafft.

Unsere Bitte ist nur, dass ihr uns wissen lasst, wo ihr dabei sein werdet und schickt uns euer RSVP fuer beide. Das ist besonders wichtig fuer die Restaurantreservierung.

This will be a special event held together with the Southern Connecticut/Westchester German Meetup.
Come and meet others from throughout the state who share a love of the German language. We will meet in Cheshire, CT for a nice lunch in an Austrian restaurant and then if the weather permits, a nice walk on the rail trail with ice cream to follow! On the rail trail you can walk as far as you would like- but the group will probably turn around after a mile (for those who can't walk too far) or two (for a four-mile roundtrip).
The French group from West Hartford is also invited to join us on the walk. Some of them speak German too!
item.name: German Restaurant trip und Spaziergang
